sentences.en: A medical institution shall place the corpse of a patient in the mortuary in time.
sentences.cn: 医疗机构应当及时将病人尸体存放停尸室.

sentences.en: Her eyes were shut. If it was not for the fact you could see her breathing — and the odd flutter of her eyelid — she could indeed have been a body in a ­mortuary.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛是闭着的（译注：可能这位记者的眼睛才是闭着的），如果你没有注意到她的呼吸和她眼睑的振颤，她简直就像一具放在太平间里的死尸。

sentences.en: I don't care. I'm feeling militant standing in front of this mortuary.
sentences.cn: 我不在乎, 站在这个停尸间面前,我感觉自己像个斗士一样.

sentences.en: I was never allowed to see her at the mortuary.
sentences.cn: 他们不允许我去停尸房看她.

sentences.en: If you try any monkey tricks with me, I will shoot you right away, and your family can come and collect your body in the mortuary.
sentences.cn: 如果你们谁敢跟我耍花样，我现在就枪毙了他，他的家人可以等着到太平间里认领他的尸体。

sentences.en: In the mortuary there are many stiffened corpses.
sentences.cn: 停尸房中摆满了僵冷的尸体.

sentences.en: Mortuary grant - in - aid and make offerings to relative pension.
sentences.cn: 丧葬补助金和供养亲属抚恤金等.

trans.tran_en: a building or room, for example in a hospital, where dead bodies are kept before they are buried or  cremate d
